thread.title: Producer Ajinkya Deo to play a pivotal role in RDP's next on Star Plus
thread.title_full: Producer Ajinkya Deo to play a pivotal role in RDP's next on Star Plus

author: dR Admire
title: Producer Ajinkya Deo to play a pivotal role in RDP's next on Star Plus
text: Producer Ajinkya Deo to play a pivotal role in RDP's next on Star Plus Follow us on Social Media Tweet We have been keeping our readers updated with exclusive information on ace film maker Ramesh Deo Productions upcoming show on Star Plus. As reported, Anuja Sathe, Vishal Gandhi, Ketki Dave and Kiran Karmarkar are already part of this ambitious project that will narrate the tale of a girl who aims to become a cricketer. Now, we have an important news of the Producer of the show, Ajinkya Deo being part of the cast!! Yes, you heard it right!! Ajinkya Deo, elder son of the film makers Ramesh Deo and Seema Deo has been a popular face in the Marathi cinema circuit. Some of his noteworthy films include Ardhangi, Sarja, Majha Ghar Majha Sansaar, Maherchi Shaadi, Avgat, Ek Krantiveer. In Hindi, he has been part of movies Sansaar, Phool Aur Angaar, Parwane, Aan: Men At Work. His latest stint as actor on TV was their directorial venture, 24 on Colors. We hear that Ajinkya will play a very important role in their upcoming show, that of a cricket selector. As per reliable sources, Ajinkyas character will be very meaty and crucial to the way the story would shape up. We tried contacting Ajinkya, but did not get through to him. Watch this space for more updates
